mapper.update: update `user` set `name` = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, birthday = #{birthday}, sex = #{sex}, student_id = #{studentId}, grade_name = #{gradeName}, class_name = #{className}, subject_id = #{subjectId}, faculty_id = #{facultyId}, department_id =#{departmentId}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl}, nationality = #{ nationality}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, qq = #{qq}
mapper.select: select u.`name`, u.nickname, u.birthday, u.sex, u.student_id, u.grade_name, u.class_name, s.subject_name, f.faculty_name, d.department_name, avatar_url, nationality, phone, email, qq from `user` u,subject s,faculty f,department d where id = #{userId} and u.subject_id = s.id and u.faculty_id = f.id and u.department_id = d.id
select id from department where department_name = #{departmentName}
select id from faculty where faculty_name = #{facultyName}
select id from subject where subject_name = #{subjectName}
